definitions.text: keep under control; keep in check

examples: restrict the use of this parking lot
limit the time you can spend with your friends

definitions.text: to close within bounds, limit or hold back from movement
examples: This holds the local until the express passengers change trains
About a dozen animals were held inside the stockade
The illegal immigrants were held at a detention center
The terrorists held the journalists for ransom

definitions.text: to compel or deter by or as if by threats
